ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 222
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The NPCs don t really fit any of the PC classes.  I ve seen casters backstab (with their fists no less), casters using two-handed swords, etc.  This is
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 27 Jul 1999, Douglass Family wrote:
>
> Actually I think Dorn is a warrior, Isnt the Indigo
> brotherhood a Dark Elf Warriors guild?

The NPCs don't really fit any of the PC classes. I've seen
casters backstab (with their fists no less), casters using
two-handed swords, etc. This is partly what makes charm so
great - that green caster can probably put your party's monk
to shame when it comes to dishing out damage in hand-to-hand
combat. :-) You become the beneficiary of a blatantly
unequal NPC/PC combat system.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
